artist: Designer: Jack Lenor Larsen; Mill: Coral Stephens Ltd.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
image_copyright: © Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc., Jack Larsen
text: When Larsen was commissioned to design the stage curtain for the Wolf Trap Theater in Virginia, the company worked with Coral Stephens, head of a handweaving studio in Swaziland. The Swazi weavers had already produced a series of casement fabrics for the Larsen line and used handspun mohair yarns. In 1971 the cloth was the largest Swazi export.
title: Wolf Trap Theater Curtain
